node.name: Vmguest and Host Primary Presented/Total Allocated and Used/Total Chargeable

property.name: Primary Presented Chargeable (GB)
property.description: Sum of primary presented Chargeable Capacity of RDMs and VMDK Files on Datastore. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Primary Used Chargeable (GB)
property.description: Sum of primary used Chargeable Capacity of RDMs and VMDK Files on Datastore. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Total Presented Chargeable (GB)
property.description: Sum of Total presented Chargeable Capacity of RDMs and VMDK Files on Datastore. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Total Used Chargeable (GB)
property.description: Sum of Total used Chargeable Capacity of RDMs and VMDK Files on Datastore. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.
For the capacity to be assigned to a service-level, the LUN providing the storage must be monitored (in the last 24h)

property.name: Disks
property.description: WWN or name of the Disk.

property.name: Array Name
property.description: Name of the Array. It is set to N/A when the array is not discovered.

property.name: LUN ID
property.description: Identifier for each LUN. It is set to N/A when the array is not discovered.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Service level that the LUN is tagged with. When array is not discovered, SL is set to "Other". The service level is set to "VirtualStorage" when the Virtual storage array is discovered but backend array is not discovered and when the LUNs backing the virtual volume are tagged with different service levels.

property.name: Primary Presented
property.description: Presented capacity for the primary LUN or Virtual Volume allocated to the host. If the array or virtual storage is not discovered, it is the host disk used capacity.

property.name: Connected Hosts
property.description: List of all hosts connected to that LUN.

property.name: Primary Presented Chargeable
property.description: The Primary presented Chargeable Capacity for the host deduplicated by shared capacity. It is Primary presented capacity split equally between all the hosts sharing the LUN.

property.name: LUN Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the LUN allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.

property.name: Virtual Storage Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the VPLEX/SVC Virtual Volume allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.

parameter.name: metric
parameter.properties: svclevel device part dgraid arraytyp sgname dgstype poolname

property.name: Array
property.description: User-defined name for the array (serial number).

property.name: LUN
property.description: System-defined name or alias for the LUN.

property.name: LUN ID
property.description: LUN identifier.

property.name: LUN Type
property.description: RAID and LUN type defined by vendor.

property.name: Pool
property.description: User-defined pool name. Not available if the LUN is neither a pool contributor or consumer.

property.name: Purpose
property.description: Role of the LUN. Possible values are Primary, Local Replica, Remote Replica, System Resource, or N/A.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Name of Service Level.

property.name: RAID Level
property.description: RAID type.

property.name: Disk Type
property.description: Base storage architecture like ATA, SATA, SAS, Flash, FC.

property.name: Storage Group
property.description: Storage Group name.

property.name: Thin / Thick
property.description: Type of Storage Provisioning i.e. (Thin/Thick).

property.name: Is Used?
property.description: Indicates if the LUN is used.

property.name: Is Masked?
property.description: Indicates if the LUN is masked.

property.name: Is Mapped?
property.description: Indicates if the LUN is mapped.

property.name: Is Meta Head?
property.description: Values are Yes or No.

property.name: Capacity (GB)
property.description: Presented capacity of the LUN.

property.name: Metric Name
property.description: The name of the metric.

property.name: Unit
property.description: The unit of measurement of the metric value.

property.name: Value
property.description: The last collected value of the metric.

property.name: Metric Name
property.description: The name of the metric.

property.name: Unit
property.description: The unit of measurement of the metric value.

property.name: Value
property.description: The last collected value of the metric.

property.name: Metric Name
property.description: The name of the metric.

property.name: Unit
property.description: The unit of measurement of the metric value.

property.name: Value
property.description: The last collected value of the metric.

property.name: Metric Name
property.description: The name of the metric.

property.name: Unit
property.description: The unit of measurement of the metric value.

property.name: Value
property.description: The last collected value of the metric.

property.name: Array
property.description: User-defined name for the array (serial number).

property.name: LUN
property.description: System-defined name or alias for the LUN.

property.name: Purpose
property.description: Indicates the purpose of the LUN. Values are Local Replica, Remote Replica.

property.name: Replication Technology
property.description: Indicates the replication technology of the LUN (where applicable)

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Service level that the LUN is tagged with.

property.name: Capacity (GB)
property.description: Capacity of the LUN.

property.name: Used Capacity (GB)
property.description: Used capacity of the LUN.

property.filterExpression: name=='Capacity' & viprsys & vsaname & vspname & volname & tenname & prjname

property.name: Virtual Volume
property.description: Name of the Virtual Volume.

property.name: Serial Number
property.description: Serial Number of the virtual storage array.

property.name: Management Host
property.description: FQDN or IP address of the virtual storage array.

property.name: Cluster Name
property.description: Name of the virtual storage array cluster.

property.name: Virtual Pool
property.description: Name of the virtual pool on the virtual storage array.

property.name: Capacity
property.description: Presented capacity of the Virtual Volume.

property.name: LUN Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the LUN behind the virtual volume has/has not been discovered.

property.name: Backend Array
property.description: Name of the backend Array connected to Virtual storage array.

parameter.name: metric
parameter.properties: svclevel device part dgraid arraytyp sgname dgstype

property.name: LUN

property.name: Purpose
property.description: Indicates the purpose of the LUN. Values are Local Replica, Remote Replica.

property.name: Service Level

property.name: Capacity (GB)
property.description: Capacity of the LUN.

property.name: Used Capacity (GB)
property.description: Used capacity of the LUN.
For the capacity to be assigned to a service-level, the LUN providing the storage must be monitored (in the last 24h)
For the capacity to be assigned to a service-level, the LUN providing the storage must be monitored (in the last 24h)

property.name: Disk
property.description: Name of the Disk.

property.name: WWN
property.description: The world wide number of the LUN.

property.name: Array Name
property.description: Name of the Array. Its set to N/A when the array is not discovered.

property.name: LUN ID
property.description: Identifier for each LUN. Its set to N/A when the array is not discovered.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Service level that the LUN is tagged with. When array is not discovered, SL is set to "Other". The service level is set to "VirtualStorage" when the Virtual storage array is discovered but backend array is not discovered and when the LUNs backing the virtual volume are tagged with different service levels.

property.name: Primary Presented
property.description: Presented Capacity of the primary LUN or the virtual volume allocated to the VM. If the array or virtual storage is not discovered, it is equal to the RDM used capacity.

property.name: Connected VMs
property.description: List of all Virtual machines connected to that LUN or virtual volume.

property.name: Primary Presented Chargeable
property.description: The Primary Presented Capacity of the disk deduplicated by shared capacity. It is Primary Presented capacity split equally between all the Virtual machines sharing the LUN.

property.name: LUN Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the LUN allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.

property.name: Virtual Storage Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the VPLEX/SVC Virtual Volume allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.

parameter.name: metric
parameter.properties: svclevel device part dgraid arraytyp sgname dgstype poolname

property.description: Used capacity of the LUN.

property.name: Virtual Volume
property.description: Name of the Virtual Volume.

property.name: Serial Number
property.description: Serial Number of the virtual storage array.

property.name: Management Host
property.description: FQDN or IP address of the virtual storage array.

property.name: Cluster Name
property.description: Name of the virtual storage array cluster.

property.name: Locality
property.description: Relative location of the Virtual Volume.

property.name: VPLEX Device
property.description: Name of the VPLEX Device.

property.name: VPLEX Storage View
property.description: Name of the VPLEX Storage View.

property.name: Capacity
property.description: Presented capacity of the Virtual Volume.

property.name: LUN Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the LUN behind the virtual volume has/has not been discovered.

parameter.name: metric
parameter.properties: svclevel device part dgraid arraytyp sgname dgstype

property.name: Array
property.description: User-defined name for the array (serial number).

property.name: LUN
property.description: System-defined name or alias for the LUN.

property.name: LUN ID
property.description: LUN identifier.

property.name: LUN Type
property.description: RAID and LUN type defined by vendor.

property.name: Pool
property.description: User-defined pool name. Not available if the LUN is neither a pool contributor or consumer.

property.name: Purpose
property.description: Role of the LUN. Possible values are Primary, Local Replica, Remote Replica, System Resource, or N/A.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Name of Service Level.

property.name: RAID Level
property.description: RAID type.

property.name: Disk Type
property.description: Base storage architecture like ATA, SATA, SAS, Flash, FC.

property.name: Storage Group
property.description: Storage Group name.

property.name: Thin / Thick
property.description: Type of Storage Provisioning i.e. (Thin/Thick).

property.name: Is Used?
property.description: Indicates if the LUN is used.

property.name: Is Masked?
property.description: Indicates if the LUN is masked.

property.name: Is Mapped?
property.description: Indicates if the LUN is mapped.

property.name: Is Meta Head?
property.description: Values are Yes or No.

property.name: Capacity (GB)
property.description: Presented capacity of the LUN.

property.name: Metric Name
property.description: The name of the metric.

property.name: Unit
property.description: The unit of measurement of the metric value.

property.name: Value
property.description: The last collected value of the metric.

property.name: Metric Name
property.description: The name of the metric.

property.name: Unit
property.description: The unit of measurement of the metric value.

property.name: Value
property.description: The last collected value of the metric.

property.name: Metric Name
property.description: The name of the metric.

property.name: Unit
property.description: The unit of measurement of the metric value.

property.name: Value
property.description: The last collected value of the metric.

property.name: Metric Name
property.description: The name of the metric.

property.name: Unit
property.description: The unit of measurement of the metric value.

property.name: Value
property.description: The last collected value of the metric.

property.name: Array
property.description: User-defined name for the array (serial number).

property.name: LUN
property.description: System-defined name or alias for the LUN.

property.name: Purpose
property.description: Indicates the purpose of the LUN. Values are Local Replica, Remote Replica.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Service level that the LUN is tagged with.

property.name: Capacity (GB)
property.description: Capacity of the LUN.

property.name: Used Capacity (GB)
property.description: Used capacity of the LUN.
For the capacity to be assigned to a service-level, the LUN providing the storage must be monitored (in the last 24h)

property.name: File Name
property.description: Name of the vmdk file.

property.name: Datastore
property.description: Name of the datastore.

property.name: VDisk Name
property.description: Name of the virtual disk.

property.name: Is RDM Definition?
property.description: Is raw device mapping enabled; values are Yes or No.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Service level that the LUN is tagged with. When array is not discovered, SL is set to "Other". The service level is set to "VirtualStorage" when the Virtual storage array is discovered but backend array is not discovered and when the LUNs backing the virtual volume are tagged with different service levels.

property.name: Primary Presented
property.description: It is the capacity of the VMDK file.

property.name: Connected VMs
property.description: List of all virtual machines connected to that LUN.

property.name: Primary Presented Chargeable
property.description: The Chargeable Capacity for the VMDK file deduplicated by shared capacity. It is Primary presented capacity split equally between all the virtual machines sharing the LUN.

property.name: LUN Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the LUN allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.

property.name: Virtual Storage Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the VPLEX/SVC Virtual Volume allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.
